description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The OCC_CD table holds the occurrence codes that apply to the claim.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: OCC_CD
columns.description: This item holds the occurrence codes that apply to the claim.

columns.name: OCC_DT
columns.description: This item holds the date corresponding to the occurrence code.
